actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for participation by fire service agencies in forfeitures resulting from acts in which such agencies participate that lead to the seizure of forfeiture of property.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to authorize the transfer of property from civil forfeitures to local fire service agencies where such agencies participated in acts which led to the seizure or forfeiture of the property.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for participation by fire service agencies in forfeitures resulting from acts in which such agencies participate that lead to the seizure of forfeiture of property.
